body_html: I see the Jenkins task crossed out but we still absolutely need to have CI for building the C++ only path, otherwise it will bitrot almost immediately. Should be pretty simple, just add something in .jenkins/build.sh

body: I see the Jenkins task crossed out but we still *absolutely* need to have CI for building the C++ only path, otherwise it will bitrot almost immediately. Should be pretty simple, just add something in `.jenkins/build.sh`
